name: The Later Lab
description:
Join together two timelines of a laboratory in order to overcome platforming obstacles.

TeamJolu

Luke Bradaric - Programming/Art

John Lee - Programming/Level Design

Metimes24 - Music

Controls

A & D - Move left and right

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Shift timelines

Left Click - Shoot Warp Gun

Escape - Open Menu

Help

Left Shift - Shifts the player between the two timelines

Warp Gun - The warp gun will teleport objects across timelines, joining separate timelines together.

Musician Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/jo-shoua
